product_name: The North Face Nimble Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Nimble jacket for women brings a lot to the table with lightweight, soft-shell material with incredible stretch; it's ideal when you need a layer that cuts the windchill down to size. TNF(TM) Apex Aerobic has the most stretch of any Apex fabric and offers optimal breathability to help you stay cool and comfortable during activity. Elastic cuffs and hem cinch cord allow a snug fit that seals in warmth. The North Face Nimble jacket features 2 zippered front pockets for securing small essentials.
short_description: The North Face Nimble jacket for women brings a lot to the table with lightweight, soft-shell material with incredible stretch; it's ideal when you need a layer that cuts the windchill down to size.
